,

Senior Node.JS Developer £75k - £90k + Bonus + Shares + Remote Working


Central London


Tech stack: Node, Typescript, AWS, Lambda

My client is a rapidly expanding technology company which are funded by a well-known startup VC who’ve put series A funding into them. Due to successful growth, they now need a talented Senior Node.JS Developer to them full time.

As Senior Node.JS Developer you will work directly with the head of the department as this business going through an exciting phase of technology change moving over to serverless tech stack.

The ideal Senior Node.JS Developer will be an expert with server-side Node.JS and understand the importance of TypeScript in infrastructure.

Key technology stack for this Senior Node.JS Developer position

  • Node.JS & TypeScript
  • AWS
  • Lambda functions
  • DynamoBD

Benefits on offer for Senior Node.JS Developer

  • Shares
  • Remote working options
  • Flexible working hours
  • Great office location
  • Free food delivered to the office
  • Regular nights out + dinners 
  • Self-improvement budget
  • Company vacations
  • Work from London & potential USA office on East Coast 
  • Career progression

This is an immediate Senior Node.JS Developer position paying £75k - £90k plus bonus.

 If you have the right skills for this Senior Node.JS Developer role, please send us your CV for immediate consideration.

Revere is acting as a talent partner on behalf of this technology company, if you have the right skills for this Senior Node.JS Developer please send us your CV for immediate consideration.
